string.name: name_required
string.font: Your name is required to continue

string.name: contactnumber_required
string.font: A contact number is required to continue

string.name: email_required
string.font: Your email address is required to continue

string.name: address_required
string.font: A street address is required to continue

string.name: city_required
string.font: A city is required to continue

string.name: state_required
string.font: A state is required to continue

string.name: zip_required
string.font: A zip code is required to continue

string.name: everywhereaddress_required
string.font: A second street address is required to continue

string.name: everywherecity_required
string.font: A second city is required to continue

string.name: everywherestate_required
string.font: A second state is required to continue

string.name: everywherezip_required
string.font: A second zip code is required to continue

string.name: starttime_required
string.font: A time the problem started is required to continue

string.name: startdate_required
string.font: A date the problem started is required to continue

string.name: othermtn_required
string.font: Please enter another mobile number experiencing the issues in the area.

string.name: details_required
string.font: Please enter some details about the problems you are experiencing to continue

resources.string: GPS provider not enabled. Would you like to enable it?

The application is unable to get the location using only GPS on the device. This could be due to location or the device not having a line-of-sight connection to the satellite. Please try moving the device or using network assisted location by pressing OK below. *Please note that network assisted location my not be as accurate as GPS only.*
